PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-02562014-03-06CIC,  DFATD,  TB,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectRemission Order in Respect of Fees for the Replacement of Permanent Resident Cards and the Issuance of Passports, Certificates of Identity and Refugee Travel Documents (Lac-Mégantic, Quebec)
PrecisRemission Order in respect of FEES FOR THE REPLACEMENT OF PERMANENT RESIDENT CARDS AND THE ISSUANCE OF PASSPORTS, CERTIFICATES OF IDENTITY AND REFUGEE TRAVEL DOCUMENTS (LAC-MÉGANTIC, QUEBEC) in order to remit the fee for replacing immigration and/or travel documents that were damaged or lost and to remit the fees for travel documents to those who recently applied, but died as a result of the train derailment and explosion in Lac-Mégantic, Quebec, on July 6, 2013.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2014-0025 Publication Date: 2014-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
